The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/29298).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29298#issuecomment-1908331771) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

Concept ACK - maybe upstream will take these patches as well? I guess we can try and send them, given we'll have to send CMake fixes in either case.

Rebased #21778 on top of this rather than #29232.
Can the ` $(package)_build_opts_darwin=LIBTOOL="$($(package)_libtool)"` line above (and same for miniupnpc) be removed now? I removed them and things compiled fine.
